title: NCBS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Facility Assistant Posts
description: The National Centre for Biological Sciences (NCBS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Facility Assistant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M. Pharm, and Post-graduation can apply for the NCBS Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit...
